With My Whole Heart\u266a: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.
Glorious Season: The Stamina Consumption of characters within Let the Show Begin♪'s Melody Loop is reduced by 12%.
